column1: The  Petitioner  has  filed  this  application  on  behalf  of  his  daughter  who  is  a  minor.  The
Petitioner seeks, inter alia, for a mandate in the nature of a writ of Mandamus against
the 1st and 2nd Respondents in order to get his daughter admitted to Kandy Girlsâ€™ High
School to Grade 1 and also for a mandate in the nature of a writ of Certiorari to quash
